item.title: EBay 预测季度收入低于预期
item.description: 电子商务公司 eBay 周三预计，由于收藏品和汽车零部件等产品类别的需求降温，第二季度营收将低于华尔街预期。【原文：Ecommerce firm eBay forecast second-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as demand cools for product categories like collector's items and auto parts.】

item.title: 由于成本增加，DoorDash 预计季度核心利润低于预期
item.description: 尽管 DoorDash 第一季度营收超过预期，但该公司周三预计第二季度核心利润低于预期，这表明成本上升抵消了杂货和食品订单增加带来的部分收益。【原文：DoorDash projected second-quarter core profit below expectations on Wednesday despite beating first-quarter revenue estimates, indicating that higher costs were offseting some of its gains from rising groceries and food orders.】

item.title: 人工智能重振智能手机市场，高通公司业绩预期超预期
item.description: 受人工智能功能推动智能手机市场复苏速度超过预期的影响，高通公司周三预计第三财季销售额和调整后利润将高于华尔街预期。【原文：Qualcomm on Wednesday forecast fiscal third-quarter sales and adjusted profit above Wall Street expectations, driven by a faster-than-expected recovery in smartphone markets thanks to artificial-intelligence features.】

item.title: 广告参与度下降，Airbnb 启动新的全球营销战略
item.description: Airbnb 周三宣布了其最新的营销战略，旨在通过提供独特的体验来吸引新客户，并将其业务拓展到度假租赁这一核心业务之外。【原文：Airbnb announced its newest marketing strategy geared towards bringing in new customers by offering unique experiences as it expands beyond its core business of vacation rentals, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称大选在即不会左右利率决定
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三重申，围绕迫在眉睫的总统大选的政治考量不会影响央行的利率决策。【原文：Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell reiterated Wednesday that political considerations around the looming presidential election will not affect the central bank's interest rate decisions.】

item.title: 美国财政部在 7 月前维持拍卖规模不变，并启动回购计划
item.description: 美国财政部周三表示，它打算在未来几个季度内保持美国票据和债券拍卖规模的稳定，这符合预期，同时它还宣布了 5 月至 7 月季度的退款总额为 1,250 亿美元。【原文：The Treasury Department said on Wednesday it intends to keep auction sizes steady for U.S. notes and bonds over the next several quarters, in line with expectations, as it announced total refunding of $125 billion for the May to July quarter.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社称，克罗格公司正在洽谈将 Disney+ 引入其杂货配送计划的事宜
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，克罗格公司（Kroger）和华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney's）正在洽谈将流媒体服务 Disney+ 引入食品零售商的杂货配送项目。【原文：Kroger and Walt Disney's are in talks to bring streaming service Disney+ to the food retailer's grocery delivery program, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储宣布缩减资产负债表运行速度
item.description: 美联储周三宣布计划放慢缩减资产负债表的速度，而在今年年初的大部分时间里，美联储一直在警告这一转变。【原文：The Federal Reserve announced plans on Wednesday to slow the speed of its balance sheet drawdown, after having spent much of the earlier part of the year warning of this shift.】

item.title: 美国议员调查美国联邦贸易委员会与欧盟合作阻止亚马逊与机器人合并案
item.description: 众议院监督委员会（House Oversight Committee）主席周三表示，他正在调查联邦贸易委员会（FTC）与欧盟委员会在亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）计划以 14 亿美元收购 iRobot 公司的交易失败中的合作情况。【原文：The chair of the House Oversight Committee said Wednesday he is investigating the Federal Trade Commission's (FTC) work with the European Commission in the collapse of Amazon.com's plan to acquire iRobot Corp in a $1.4 billion deal.】

item.title: FOMC 维持利率不变，并将放缓资产负债表缩减速度
item.description: 美联储周三表示将维持利率不变，并宣布计划放慢缩减资产负债表的速度，而在今年早些时候的大部分时间里，美联储一直在警告这一转变。【原文：The Federal Reserve on Wednesday said it would leave interest rates unchanged and announced plans to slow the speed of its balance sheet drawdown, after having spent much of the earlier part of the year warning of this shift.】

item.title: 美国液化天然气开发商泰勒瑞安在出售谈判中将生产工人遣送回国
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的人士透露，美国液化天然气（LNG）开发商Tellurian Inc.已将其上游天然气生产业务的十几名工人遣送回国。【原文：U.S. liquefied natural gas (LNG) developer Tellurian Inc. has sent home more than a dozen workers from its upstream gas production business, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 咨询公司 Glass Lewis 建议壳牌投资者在股东大会上反对股东气候决议
item.description: 投资者代理咨询公司 Glass Lewis 建议壳牌股东投票反对由 27 家投资者组成的团体提出的一项决议，该团体敦促壳牌能源公司制定更严格的气候目标。【原文：Investor proxy advisory Glass Lewis recommended Shell shareholders vote against a resolution filed by a group of 27 investors urging the energy company to set tighter climate targets.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克对特斯拉的全面改革打击了他所吹捧的高管职位
item.description: 就在一年多以前，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在德克萨斯州举行的特斯拉投资者日上与 16 位高管同台，他们详细介绍了公司的技术和发展计划，然后排在老板身后以示团结。【原文：Just over a year ago, Elon Musk shared the stage at Tesla's investor day in Texas with 16 executives who gave detailed presentations on the company's technology and growth plans, then lined up behind their boss in a show of solidarity.】

item.title: 纽约市养老金领袖反对选举阿美石油公司总裁为贝莱德董事
item.description: 纽约市一家雇员养老基金敦促贝莱德的股东投票反对选举沙特阿美公司首席执行官为董事，理由是该资产管理公司的去碳化战略可能存在利益冲突，以及人权问题。【原文：A pension fund for New York City employees urged BlackRock's shareholders to vote against the election of Saudi Aramco's chief executive as director, citing potential conflicts of interest around the asset manager's decarbonizing strategy as well as human rights concerns.】

item.title: 美国采取行动禁止华为等中国电信企业认证无线设备
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会官员周三告诉路透社，该委员会正着手阻止华为、中兴和其他被认为对美国国家安全构成威胁的外国公司获得无线设备认证。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission is moving to prevent Huawei, ZTE and other foreign companies deemed to pose U.S. national security concerns from certifying wireless equipment, officials told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国发布数百项针对俄罗斯的制裁措施，矛头直指中国企业
item.description: 美国周三就乌克兰战争针对俄罗斯发布了数百项新制裁措施，矛头直指莫斯科规避西方措施的行为，包括通过中国采取的措施。【原文：The United States on Wednesday issued hundreds of fresh sanctions targeting Russia over the war in Ukraine in action that took aim at Moscow's circumvention of Western measures, including through China.】

item.title: 随着越来越多的人在家用餐，美国快餐连锁店可能不得不加大促销力度
item.description: 本周，麦当劳和星巴克等快餐业巨头的销售额疲软，全球快餐业巨头可能不得不推出更大幅度的促销活动，以吸引受通货膨胀影响而越来越多地选择在家用餐的顾客。【原文：Global fast food giants may have to dole out steeper promotions to lure inflation-hit customers who are increasingly opting to eat at home, following weak sales from the likes of McDonald's and Starbucks this week.】

item.title: Spirit Aero 称已制定解决波音 737 MAX 零部件需求的新计划
item.description: Spirit AeroSystems 公司周三告诉路透社，该公司已制定了一项计划，使其 "有高度信心 "达到美国飞机制造商波音公司对 737 MAX 喷气式飞机零部件的生产率和质量预期。【原文：Spirit AeroSystems said it has developed a plan that gives it “a high degree of confidence” to meet U.S. planemaker Boeing's rate and quality expectations for parts for the 737 MAX jet, the company told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 邮轮运营商维京游轮股价纽约首涨 9
item.description: 维京控股公司（Viking Holdings）的股票周三在纽约证券交易所首次亮相时上涨了 9%，使这家旅游和游轮公司的估值达到 110 亿美元。【原文：Shares of Viking Holdings rose 9% in their debut on the New York Stock Exchange on Wednesday, giving the travel and cruising company a valuation of $11 billion.】

item.title: 美国贸易委员会将调查 GoPro 声称中国公司侵犯其专利的指控
item.description: 美国国际贸易委员会（U.S. International Trade Commission）周三表示，它正在对 GoPro 公司声称其相机和摄像系统专利被一家向美国进口类似产品的中国公司侵犯一事展开贸易调查。【原文：The U.S. International Trade Commission said on Wednesday it was launching a trade investigation into claims by GoPro Inc that its camera and camera systems patents were violated by a Chinese company importing similar products into the U.S.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，美国联邦贸易委员会将对埃克森-先锋公司价值 600 亿美元的交易做出裁决
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国联邦贸易委员会将在未来几天内决定是否提起诉讼，阻止埃克森美孚以 600 亿美元收购先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources）。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is set to decide whether to sue to block Exxon Mobil's $60 billion acquisition of Pioneer Natural Resources in the coming days, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国监管机构讨论最快于 8 月敲定银行资本规则
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，美联储和其他美国最高监管机构正在推进让大银行持有更多资本的计划。【原文：The Federal Reserve and other top U.S. regulators are forging ahead with their plan to make big banks hold more capital, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: Ortex 称，NYCB 卖空者在收益后反弹后面临 4,200 万美元的损失
item.description: Ortex提供的数据显示，周三做空纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）股票的交易员蒙受了4200多万美元的损失，因为该银行对未来两年的盈利预测好于预期，导致股价飙升。【原文：Traders shorting New York Community Bancorp's stock were sitting on more than $42 million of losses on Wednesday after the lender's better-than-expected profit forecast for the next two years sent shares surging, data from Ortex show.】

item.title: 独家报道特斯拉退出下一代 "千兆铸造 "制造工艺
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，特斯拉已经放弃了在其开创性制造工艺--千兆铸造方面进行创新的雄心勃勃的计划，这是这家电动汽车制造商在销量下滑和竞争加剧的情况下正在缩减开支的又一迹象。【原文：Tesla has backed away from an ambitious plan for innovations in gigacasting, its pioneering manufacturing process, according to two sources familiar with the matter, in another sign that the electric-vehicle maker is retrenching amid falling sales and rising competition.】

item.title: 美国三月份建筑支出下降
item.description: 美国 3 月份的建筑支出意外下降，可能是因为抵押贷款利率回升拖累了住宅建设，但住房严重短缺仍为建筑活动提供了支撑。【原文：U.S. construction spending unexpectedly fell in March likely as a resurgence in mortgage rates weighed on homebuilding, but activity remains supported by an acute housing shortage.】

item.title: 据 NBC 新闻报道，美国检察官正在审查布洛克公司的金融交易
item.description: 据 NBC 新闻周三援引两位直接知情人士的话报道，美国检察官正在审查布洛克公司的财务交易。【原文：U.S. prosecutors are examining financial transactions at Block , NBC News reported on Wednesday, citing two people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国 3 月份职位空缺降至三年来最低点
item.description: 美国 3 月份的职位空缺降至三年来的最低点，而辞职人数则有所下降，这些迹象表明劳动力市场状况有所缓和，随着时间的推移，将有助于美联储对抗通胀。【原文：U.S. job openings fell to a three-year low in March, while the number of people quitting their jobs declined, signs of easing labor market conditions that over time could aid the Federal Reserve's fight against inflation.】

item.title: 耶伦警告美联储侵蚀美国民主威胁经济增长
item.description: 根据美国财政部公布的讲话节选，美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）将于本周五表示，强大的民主体制（包括独立的美联储）是实现持续和共同增长与繁荣的关键基础。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen will make the argument on Friday that strong democratic institutions -- including an independent Federal Reserve -- are a key foundation for sustained and shared growth and prosperity, according to excerpts of remarks released by the Treasury.】

item.title: 美国制造业 4 月份出现倒退；支付价格接近两年高点
item.description: 美国制造业在上月短暂扩张后，4 月份在订单减少的情况下出现萎缩，而衡量工厂支付投入品价格的指标接近两年来的最高点。【原文：U.S. manufacturing contracted in April amid a decline in orders after briefly expanding in the prior month, while a measure of prices paid by factories for inputs approached a two-year high.】

item.title: 飞机租赁商 DAE 今年将接收半数承诺的波音飞机
item.description: 迪拜航空航天企业（DAE）首席执行官周三表示，飞机租赁商迪拜航空航天企业（DAE）资本公司今年从波音公司接收的飞机数量可能会比波音公司最初承诺的数量少一半左右。【原文：Aircraft lessor Dubai Aerospace Enterprise (DAE) Capital will likely receive around half the number of aircraft from Boeing this year than the planemaker had originally committed to deliver, DAE's chief executive said on Wednesday.】
